name: Mindhive: Curse from The Malice
description:
Get updates first at: https://gamejolt.com/games/cursefromthemalice/759303

In "Mindhive: Curse from the Malice" the player's friend has been trapped in a parallel dimension by an evil being known as Wiktor. The player must journey through this alternate dimension, navigating its dangers and challenges, in order to rescue their friend before it's too late.

As the player explores the dimension, they will encounter all sorts of strange and terrifying creatures. They will have to use their wits and resourcefulness to survive and find a way to rescue their friend. Along the way, they will have to face off against the Malice itself, a powerful and malevolent being that seeks to destroy all that moves.

Through their journey, the player will have to make difficult choices and overcome their own fears and doubts in order to save their friend and defeat Wiktor. In the end, they will have to use all of their skills and cunning to triumph over evil and free their friend from the curse.
